title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers               Visitor Centers         Cal S. Taggart Bighorn Canyon Visitor Center NPS  The Bighorn Canyon Visitor Center in Lovell, Wyoming is a must stop with exhibits, films, and a bookstore! In addition, it is open all year. Click here for more details...        Afterbay Contact Station NPS  The Afterbay Contact Station, on the edge of Fort Smith, is your first stopping point if you are headed into the northern part of the park. Click here for more details...        Yellowtail Dam and Visitor Center NPS  The Yellowtail Dam Visitor Center is set in a dramatic location astride the edge of Bighorn Canyon! It is open during the summer. Click here for more details...        Crooked Creek Contact Station NPS  The Crooked Creek Contact Station is in the southern part of the park. It is a great place to get information and questions answered! Click here for more details...
